Text: Debrii (Deborah Fields) is a fictional character, a superheroine appearing in American comic books published by Marvel Comics.

Text: Debrii:  She was created by artist Skottie Young with the help of writer Zeb Wells.

Text: Debrii:  She avoided being killed in the opening shots of Marvel's Civil War by not reuniting with the team after their reality show was cancelled the first time in "New Warriors" vol.
